rukus.text: 56|1|nowpel del pru tde kar thngai barlok ban kaetlaeng .
56|2|kmean anaknea mneak ach bdeseth nung pru tde kar robsa vea ban laey .
56|3|pru tde kar noh nung tomleak anakakhleah( tow knong nork)  ning leuk  kampsa anakakhleah( nowknong thansuokr) .
56|4|nowpel del phendei trauv ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlang .
56|5|haey banda phnom trauv ban ke bambek khe  t ch khtei .
56|6|haey vea ban klaycha thouli del rsat tam khyal .
56|7|haey puok anak nung klaytowchea bei krom .
56|8|ku krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam .  saamnang avei mlih  champoh krom daisdam noh.( puokke nung chaul thansuokr) .
56|9|ning krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) dai che  v ng .  aphpv avei mlih champoh krom dai che  v ng noh.( puokke nung chaul thanonork) .
56|10|haeyning krom del neamoukh ke( knong kar sang ampeula now  knong lokey)  krom noh haeynung neamoukh ke( chaul thansuokr now  thngai barlok) .
56|11|anak teangnoh haey chea anak del now chit nung a l laoh  bamphot .
56|12|ku nowknong thansuokr na ai m .
56|13|puokke pheakochraen chea anak chomnean moun .
56|14|haey puokke pheaktech chea anak chomnean kraoy .
56|15|( puokke) now leu kre  del thveu ampi measa  ning tbaungpechr  da meanotamlei .
56|16|daoy puokke angkouyophaek bermoukh tl knea now leu kre noh .
56|17|haey ke  m ng  del now vy ke  m ng chea amt daerchoumvinh ( samreab bamreu) puokke .
56|18|cheamuoynung peng  ning kamsiev  haeyning kev sra mk pi t ne  l  sra del haur( nowknong thansuokr) .
56|19|daoy puokke kmean a kar chhukbeal  haeyka min batbng  smartei daoysaar sra noh der .
56|20|ning phlechheu cheachraen tam del puokke ach chreusareusa .
56|21|ning sach baksaei cheachraen tam te avei del puokke trauvkar  .
56|22|haeyning sreitepoabsaar daoy mean phnek srasa saat .
56|23|brieb ban dauchchea kchkhyang delke theroksaa touk yeang la .
56|24|teangnih kuchea kar tabasnang champoh avei del puokke thleab ban  sang .
56|25|nowknong vea( thansuokr)  puokke minlyy peakyasaamdei del it  brayoch laey  haeyka minlyy peakyasaamdei del noam aoy mean babakamm  der .
56|26|meante peaky chounopr knea  au serisuosdei serisuosdei ao  tebonnaoh .
56|27|haey krom( del ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam .  saamnang avei mlih champoh krom daisdam noh.( puokke nung chaul thansuokr) .
56|28|puokke now rveang daem poutrea del kmean banlea .
56|29|ning daemchek del mean phle truot leu knea .
56|30|ning kraomomlob del amt .
56|31|ning tuk del haur it chhbchhr .
56|32|ning phlechheu yeang chraen .
56|33|del min cheh asa  haeyka kmean kar hamkhat( pi kar  ttuoltean phlechheu noh) der .
56|34|ning pouk cheachraen del khpasa now leu kre .
56|35|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban bangkeut puok neang( srei knong thansuokr) nouv kar bangkeut muoy( khosapi kar bangkeut nowknong lokey) .
56|36|haey yeung ban thveu aoy puok neang now kramoum prohmcheari rhaut .
56|37|del sraleanh te svami robsa puok neang bonnaoh  ning mean  ayou smae  knea .
56|38|( yeung ban bangkeut puok neang)  ku samreab te krom(del  ttuol banhchi daoy) daisdam .
